name: user-switching
description: Instant switching between user accounts in WordPress.
author: John Blackbourn

scripts.icons: sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon.svg -o .wordpress-org/icon-128x128.png -f png --palette resize 128 128 && sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon.svg -o .wordpress-org/icon-256x256.png -f png --palette resize 256 256
